name: CALPALMY (4-Pack 100W Reptile Heat Lamp Bulbs - UVA Daylight Basking Light Bulbs for Reptiles, Turtles, Lizard, Bearded Dragon and Amphibians - 120V R80 Reflector Bulbs with E26 Screw Cap Base
short_description: SIMULATE DAYLIGHT - These reflector bulbs can produce a focused beam of light and heat that can create an efficient heat gradient so reptiles can thermoregulate. This overhead radiant source is also conducive to reptile behavior, metabolism, and reproductive health

SUITABLE FOR TURTLES, SNAKES, GECKOS - Bulbs like these are especially beneficial for all types of pet reptiles and amphibians. This includes bearded dragons, lizards, chameleons, snakes, geckos, turtles, tortoises, frogs, and more
STANDARD E26 BASE REFLECTOR BULBS - Fit on standard 120V E26 bulb sockets. These R80 LED reflector spotlight bulbs are 80mm (3.1 inches) in diameter and 110mm (4.3 inches) in length

NOT SUITABLE FOR USE WITH DIMMERS, THERMOSTATS, AND RHEOSTATS - These bulbs are non-dimmable and will buzz, flicker, then die out prematurely when used with a dimmer switch. Only use a lamp with the correct voltage and wattage for these bulbs
PLACE 30CM AWAY FROM PETS - Please take into consideration the length of these reflector bulbs. You may need to adjust the lamp’s distance to avoid exposing your pets to direct heat from the bulbs

name: Reptile Heat Lamp, Heat Lamp with Clamp, UVA UVB Reptile Light with Intelligent Cycle Timer for Turtle, Bearded Dragon, Lizard and More, 2 Bulbs 50W+75W
short_description: 【Newly Upgraded Bell-Mouth Design】 :This newly upgraded heating lamp with a TFNN bell-mouth design provides a wider range of UVA/B ultraviolet rays compared to the design of ordinary models. It can simultaneously heat and illuminate multiple reptiles. The light is adjustable, making it suitable for different seasons and various reptiles, and it is extremely convenient to use.

【Upgrade Timer】:The reptile heat lamp offers three timing cycle modes (3H/6H/12H), enabling all-night cyclic timing with automatic on/off functions. Additionally, it has three adjustable heating brightness levels. You can use the "+/-" buttons to adjust the temperature to find the most suitable setting for your pet, which is more conducive to heating and supplementing calcium for your pet. It provides more direct sunlight and higher UVA/B turtle basking light, simulating natural sunlight and promoting the pet's appetite and calcium absorption.

【360°Rotatable Swan Neck 】 : This heating lamp is made with a 15.8-inch swan neck. The independently rotating head is constructed from stainless steel tubing, capable of rotating 360 degrees. It allows for flexible control of the light's distance and angle without deformation, ensuring a wider coverage of the light. It can simultaneously provide heating and supplementary lighting for multiple tanks and pets, and can be applied to small habitats of various sizes such as pet boxes, turtle tanks, glass ball boxes, enclosures, aquariums.

【Upgraded Quality Material】 :The reptile heat lamp clip, lamp tube and lampshade are made of high-quality metal, featuring heat resistance. The clip has a stronger gripping force. It can be firmly and easily installed in any position and fixed effectively. It has two built-in electroplated bulbs, with power ratings of 50W and 75W respectively. The silver-plating process is adopted to ensure anti-oxidation and explosion-proof performance, and the vacuum glass tube extends the lifespan of each bulb. These bulbs simulate the solar spectrum and increase the temperature to achieve the best health condition for pets.

【Wide Use】 : This TFNN bell-mouth heating lamp is suitable for most amphibians, reptiles, and plants, including turtles, bearded dragons, lizards, geckos, frogs, toads, snakes, chickens, birds, and even fish and plants.
